info.title: Waiting List API
info.description: API documentation for the Waiting List SaaS application

get.description: Get a paginated list of restaurant owners (users who have added restaurant users) for admin users

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by owner name or email

get.description: Get a paginated list of restaurant users for a specific owner for admin users

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by username or mobile number

get.description: Get dashboard statistics for admin users

post.description: Handles Google OAuth authentication and creates/returns user with Sanctum token

get.description: Returns details of the currently authenticated user

post.description: Revokes the current user's authentication token
Authenticate admin user with email and password
Set a PIN for the authenticated user after first Google OAuth login
Authenticate user with email and PIN

put.description: Update the authenticated user's profile information

get.description: Get a paginated list of all restaurants for admin users

post.description: Create a new restaurant entry for admin users

get.description: Get a paginated list of public restaurants (no authentication required)
Retrieve details of a specific restaurant by ID for admin users

put.description: Update an existing restaurant entry for admin users

delete.description: Remove a restaurant entry for admin users

get.description: Retrieve the restaurant owned by the authenticated user

post.summary: Create or update authenticated user's restaurant
post.description: Create or update the restaurant owned by the authenticated user
Toggle the active/inactive status of a restaurant for admin users
Toggle the active/inactive status of the authenticated user's restaurant

get.description: Get a paginated list of restaurant users with optional filtering and search

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by username or mobile number

post.description: Create a new restaurant user entry

400.description: No restaurant found for this user

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific restaurant user by ID

put.description: Update an existing restaurant user entry

get.description: Search for restaurant users by phone number for auto-fill functionality

message.example: User found with this phone number

post.description: Update restaurant user status to dine-in

500.description: Failed to mark user as dine-in

post.description: Update restaurant user status to waiting (undo dine-in)

500.description: Failed to mark user as waiting

get.description: Get the current waiting count for the authenticated user's restaurant
Retrieve application settings (Admin only)
Retrieve public application settings (no authentication required)
Get all subscription plans (enabled plans for users, all plans for admins)

post.description: Create a new subscription plan (Admin only)

get.description: Get details of a specific subscription plan

put.description: Update an existing subscription plan (Admin only)

422.description: Cannot delete plan with active subscriptions

get.description: Get a paginated list of transactions (Admin only)

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by restaurant name, plan name, or transaction ID

get.description: Get details of a specific transaction (Admin only)
Get transaction statistics (Admin only)
Get all subscription history for the authenticated user

post.description: Purchase a subscription plan for the authenticated user

422.description: Validation failed or subscription plan not available

get.description: Get the current subscription status for the authenticated user

post.description: Cancel the active subscription for the authenticated user

get.description: Get details of a specific subscription for the authenticated user

post.description: Create a Razorpay order for subscription purchase

get.description: Get all transactions for the authenticated user
